tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_training (
  researcher_id INT,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  training_completed BOOLEAN,
  training_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ethics_compliance_officers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE training_completion (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    completion_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    CONSTRAINT fk_researcher_id FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(id)
)
